statements: DELETE FROM customs_data WHERE customs_id = 100 AND import_country = 'USA' AND export_country = 'Canada';
DELETE FROM customs_data WHERE item_value > 500.00 AND tariff_code = '12345';
DELETE FROM customs_data WHERE customs_office = 'Port of New York' AND import_activity = 'Goods'
DELETE FROM tariffs WHERE country_origin = 'USA' AND country_destination = 'Canada'
DELETE FROM export_activities WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM export_activities ORDER BY export_date DESC LIMIT 10);
DELETE FROM tariffs WHERE country = 'USA' AND product_name = 'Electronics' AND effective_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Export_Activities WHERE export_quantity > 1000 AND to_country = 'USA';
